name: Shocked! Part 01
description:
Script: Michel Miron

Assets:
Background: Lornn
Sprite: FreeGameAssets

The game is still a prototype and  it will get updates in the future!

Shocked! Part 01 is a visual novel focused on Maddie, a girl that loves gossip and it's unhappy with her job as a postman. Discover the mysteries of this post-monarch medieval fantasy while she figures out what to do with her life. 

Contains:

One ending (for now!)
4 to 7 choices (for now!)
